result.eng: I only have a temporary contract.
result.html: Níl agam ach conradh sealadachI only have a temporary contract.
result.ponchtml: Níl agam aċ conraḋ sealadaċI only have a temporary contract.

result.eng: Our life on earth is temporary.
result.ga: Is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamh
result.orig: Is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamh
result.html: Is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamhOur life on earth is temporary.
result.ponchtml: Is neaṁḃuan ár mbeaṫa ar talaṁOur life on earth is temporary.

result.eng: This is only a temporary arrangement.
result.html: Is socrú gearrthéarmach é seoThis is only a temporary arrangement.
result.ponchtml: Is socrú gearrṫéarmaċ é seoThis is only a temporary arrangement.

result.eng: The school has been in temporary accommodation for a year.
result.ga: Tá an scoil i gcóiríocht shealadach le bliain
result.orig: Tá an scoil i gcóiríocht shealadach le bliain
result.html: Tá an scoil i gcóiríocht shealadach le bliainThe school has been in temporary accommodation for a year.
result.ponchtml: Tá an scoil i gcóiríoċt ẛealadaċ le bliainThe school has been in temporary accommodation for a year.

result.eng: It is a temporary position, but my wife is a nurse and that is a permanent position.
result.ga: Is post sealadach é ach is banaltra í mo bhean agus is post buan é sin
result.orig: Is post sealadach é ach is banaltra í mo bhean agus is post buan é sin
result.html: Is post sealadach é ach is banaltra í mo bhean agus is post buan é sinIt is a temporary position, but my wife is a nurse and that is a permanent position.
result.ponchtml: Is post sealadaċ é aċ is banaltra í mo ḃean agus is post buan é sinIt is a temporary position, but my wife is a nurse and that is a permanent position.
